name: NightEngine Physics Demo (VR)
description:
NightEngine is a physics framework developed by Late Night Studios. The purpose of this demo is to gather as much feedback from the public as possible to further improve the framework.

The goal of the demo is simple, escape! How is up to you, the level is openly designed so you can complete it however you desire, cheat using physics, take the official route or other, it's up to you! It will test all the core aspects of the framework from

  • General Locomotion
  • Climbing
  • Jumping
  • Object Interaction
  • Physical Presence
  • Full Body Avatars
  • And more

Once you play the demo upon closing a google form will open where you can give us some feedback (optionally of course), you can also join our discord server if you want to follow the latest on our work!

Feedback or not, thank you for taking part! A special thanks to the boosters on the SOR discord who were able to give us early feedback to ensure it's playable for everyone else.
